tagline: Wealth management for the rest of us

portfolio.name: Name
portfolio.delete: Delete portfolio {{code}} and all associated transactions?
events.error.retrieve: Error retrieving events for the asset
portfolio.currency.base.label: Cost Currency
trade.market.title: Market Trade
trade.cash.title: Cash Transaction
corporate.title: Corporate Actions
corporate.noEvents: No corporate actions found for this period
corporate.overridePayDate: Override pay date to process now
corporate.payDate.pending: Pay date in future - click to edit
corporate.transactionCreated.hint: Transaction sent to bc-data with pay date: {{date}}
corporate.info: These are the corporate events we know about. Click the play button to dispatch a transaction to your portfolio. The effective date can be edited before processing.
corporate.reconciled.hint: Reconciliation status - shows if a matching transaction exists in your portfolio
corporate.backfill.hint: Process all missing events that are ready (effective pay date has passed)
corporate.portfolio.title: Portfolio Corporate Actions
corporate.portfolio.info: Scan your portfolio to find corporate actions (dividends, splits) that may not have been recorded as transactions.
corporate.portfolio.scan.prompt: Click the button below to scan all positions in this portfolio for missing corporate actions.
corporate.portfolio.noMissing: All corporate actions have been recorded. No missing events found.
corporate.portfolio.found: Found {{count}} missing corporate action(s) that can be processed.
rebalance.title: Rebalance Position
account.name: Asset Name
account.name.hint: Descriptive name (e.g., My USD Savings, Main Residence)
accounts.title: Custom Assets
accounts.name: Name
accounts.empty: You have no custom assets. Click Add Asset to create one.
accounts.edit.title: Edit Asset
accounts.delete.title: Delete Asset
accounts.delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this asset?
accounts.delete.warning: This action cannot be undone. Any transactions associated with this asset will remain but reference a deleted asset.
category.ACCOUNT.desc: Track savings, current, and fixed deposit accounts. Bank accounts always have a value of 1 per unit of currency.
category.TRADE.desc: Trading or brokerage accounts used for settling security transactions. Link these to portfolios for automatic cash settlement.
category.RE.desc: Real estate properties and land. Set periodic valuations to track property appreciation over time.
category.MUTUAL FUND.desc: Unlisted mutual funds and unit trusts. Set prices manually as these don't have market data feeds.
category.POLICY.desc: Insurance policies with cash value such as whole life or endowment policies. Track surrender values over time.
accounts.overview.title: Custom Assets
accounts.overview.description: Manage assets that are not traded on public exchanges. These include bank accounts, real estate, unlisted funds, and other private holdings.
accounts.tab.empty.hint: Click Add Asset to create one.
price.set.title: Set Asset Price
price.error.invalid: Please enter a valid price greater than 0
accounts.import.title: Import Assets
accounts.import.hint: Import assets from a CSV file. The file should have columns: Code, Name, Category, Currency.
accounts.import.select: Click or drop a CSV file here
portfolios.title: Portfolios
portfolios.import.title: Import Portfolios
portfolios.import.hint: Import portfolios from a CSV file. The file should have columns: Code, Name, Currency, Base.
portfolios.import.select: Click or drop a CSV file here

allocation.description: View how your assets are distributed across all portfolios

allocation.valueIn.label: Value in
displayCurrency.approximate: Values shown in display currency - Cost/Gains are approximate

settings.defaultHoldingsView.description: The view to show when opening the Holdings page
settings.baseCurrency.description: Your preferred base currency for new portfolios
